colors.title: Color Settings
colors.backgroundColorHelp: Sets the background color of the form container
colors.textColorHelp: Sets the color of all text elements in the form
colors.primaryColorHelp: Sets the color for buttons, focus states, and accent elements
colors.borderColorHelp: Sets the color for input field borders and dividers
colors.websiteBackgroundColorHelp: Sets the background color of the entire website/page

typography.title: Typography Settings
typography.previewLine1: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
typography.fontHelp: Choose from hundreds of Google Fonts. The font will be loaded automatically.

layout.title: Layout Settings
layout.formWidthHelp: Controls the maximum width of the form container
layout.internalPaddingHelp: Controls the space inside the form container
layout.externalMarginHelp: Controls the space around the form container
layout.cornerRadiusHelp: Controls how rounded the form corners appear

presets.description: Quick-start with beautiful pre-designed form styles

text.label: Text Input

phone.description: Input for phone numbers with validation.

time.description: Select or enter a time value.

address.label: Address
address.description: Input for street, city, and other address details.

link.label: Link
link.description: Input for a valid website URL.

radio.label: Radio Buttons
radio.description: Pick a single option from a list.

slider.label: Slider
slider.description: Pick a value by sliding a handle.

rating.description: Collect a star or icon rating.

poll.label: Poll

signature.description: Draw or sign with mouse or touch.

banner.description: Show a highlighted message or warning.

field-group.label: Field Group
field-group.description: Group fields together in a row.

emptyState.title: No field selected
emptyState.description: Click on a field in the preview to edit its settings

basic.fieldLabelHelp: The label that appears above the field
basic.placeholderHelp: Hint text that appears inside the field

basic.descriptionHelp: Additional help text shown below the field
basic.requiredHelp: Users must fill this field to submit the form

prepopulation.enabledHelp: Automatically fill this field with existing data
prepopulation.urlParamHelp: The parameter name to extract from the URL query string

prepopulation.overwriteExistingHelp: Replace user input with pre-populated value
prepopulation.previewUrlHelp: This URL will pre-populate the field with "Sample {label}"
prepopulation.apiEndpointHelp: The API endpoint to fetch data from
prepopulation.requestHeadersHelp: JSON object containing HTTP headers for the API request
prepopulation.profileComingSoon: User profile pre-population will be available in a future update.
prepopulation.previousComingSoon: Previous submission pre-population will be available in a future update.

slider.defaultValueHelp: Pre-filled value when the form loads

link.title: Link Field Settings

emailValidation.title: Email Validation
emailValidation.autoCompleteHelp: Users can enter just their username and the domain will be auto-completed
emailValidation.allowedHelp: Only emails from these domains will be accepted
emailValidation.blockedHelp: Emails from these domains will be rejected (temporary email services are blocked by default)
emailValidation.requireBusinessEmailHelp: Only allow business domains (blocks Gmail, Yahoo, etc.)
emailValidation.customValidationPlaceholder: Custom error message for email validation
emailValidation.customValidationHelp: Leave empty to use default messages

basicInfoSection.basicDescription: Configure the basic details of your form
basicInfoSection.internalTitleDescription: This title is only visible to you in the dashboard and form builder
basicInfoSection.internalTitlePlaceholder: Enter internal title for your reference...
basicInfoSection.publicTitleDescription: This title will be displayed to users on the actual form. Leave empty to use the internal title.
basicInfoSection.publicTitlePlaceholder: Enter title to display to users...
basicInfoSection.redirectUrlDescription: URL to redirect users after successful submission
basicInfoSection.behaviorDescription: Configure how your form behaves and appears to users
basicInfoSection.hideHeaderDescription: Hides public title and description in embeds
basicInfoSection.autoFocusDescription: Automatically focus on the first field when form loads

passwordProtectionSection.title: Password Protection
passwordProtectionSection.description: Restrict access to your form with a password
passwordProtectionSection.enableDescription: Require users to enter a password to access the form
passwordProtectionSection.passwordDescription: Users will need to enter this password to access the form
passwordProtectionSection.customMessagePlaceholder: Enter custom message for password prompt
passwordProtectionSection.customMessageDescription: Message shown to users when they need to enter the password
passwordProtectionSection.summarySuffix: . Users will need to enter the password to access the form.
passwordProtectionSection.disabledDescription: Password protection restricts access to your form by requiring users to enter a password before they can view and submit the form.
passwordProtectionSection.saveFailed: Failed to save password protection settings
passwordProtectionSection.defaultMessage: This form is password protected. Please enter the password to continue.

duplicatePreventionSection.title: Duplicate Prevention
duplicatePreventionSection.description: Prevent users from submitting the same form multiple times
duplicatePreventionSection.enableDescription: Prevent users from submitting the same form multiple times
duplicatePreventionSection.oneTimeDescription: Allow only one submission per user, ever
duplicatePreventionSection.timeBasedDescription: Prevent duplicate submissions within a specified time window
duplicatePreventionSection.strategyCombinedDescription: Track by combination of IP, email, and session for maximum accuracy
duplicatePreventionSection.strategyEmailDescription: Track by email address (requires email field in form)
duplicatePreventionSection.timeWindowDescription: How long to prevent duplicate submissions
duplicatePreventionSection.maxAttemptsDescription: Maximum attempts allowed within time window
duplicatePreventionSection.errorMessageDescription: Message shown to users when they try to submit a duplicate
duplicatePreventionSection.allowOverrideDescription: Allow users to bypass prevention (not recommended)
duplicatePreventionSection.disabledDescription: Duplicate prevention helps maintain data quality by preventing users from submitting the same form multiple times. Choose between time-based prevention or one-time submission mode.
duplicatePreventionSection.saveFailed: Failed to save duplicate prevention settings
duplicatePreventionSection.defaultMessageOneTime: You have already submitted this form. Each user can only submit once.
duplicatePreventionSection.defaultMessageTimeBased: You have already submitted this form. Please wait before submitting again.

profanityFilterSection.title: Profanity Filter
profanityFilterSection.description: Automatically detect and filter inappropriate content
profanityFilterSection.enableDescription: Automatically detect and filter inappropriate content
profanityFilterSection.strictModeOption: Strict Mode - Reject submissions with profanity
profanityFilterSection.replaceModeOption: Replace Mode - Replace profanity with asterisks
profanityFilterSection.customMessagePlaceholder: Enter a custom message to show when profanity is detected
profanityFilterSection.customWordsPlaceholder: Enter word(s) to filter (comma-separated for multiple)
profanityFilterSection.whitelistPlaceholder: Enter word(s) to whitelist (comma-separated for multiple)
profanityFilterSection.disabledDescription: Profanity filter helps maintain a clean and professional environment by automatically detecting and filtering inappropriate content in form submissions.
profanityFilterSection.saveFailed: Failed to save profanity filter settings

notificationsSection.title: Notifications
notificationsSection.description: Configure email alerts for new form submissions
notificationsSection.enableDescription: Enable email notifications for new submissions

brandingSection.title: Branding
brandingSection.description: Manage Ikiform branding and social media links
brandingSection.showPoweredByDescription: Display a small attribution in the footer
brandingSection.socialMediaDescription: Enable links to your social profiles on the form
brandingSection.disabledDescription: Enable social media links to display your social profiles on your forms.

metadataSection.canonicalUrlDescription: The preferred URL for this form page
metadataSection.ogTitleDescription: Title shown when shared on Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.
metadataSection.ogDescriptionDescription: Description shown when shared on social media
metadataSection.indexingDescription: Control how search engines crawl this form
metadataSection.indexingBehaviorDescription: Controls whether search engines can index and follow links on this page

rateLimitSection.title: Rate Limiting
rateLimitSection.description: Control submission frequency to prevent spam and abuse
rateLimitSection.enableDescription: Limit submissions from the same IP address
rateLimitSection.blockDurationDescription: How long to block after limit is reached
rateLimitSection.messageLabel: Message shown when rate limit is exceeded
rateLimitSection.messagePlaceholder: Too many submissions. Please try again later.
rateLimitSection.messageDescription: Custom message shown when the rate limit is exceeded
rateLimitSection.summarySentence: Allow {maxSubmissions} submissions every {timeWindow} minutes. Block for {blockDuration} minutes when exceeded.
rateLimitSection.summaryExample: Example: If a user submits {maxSubmissions} times in {timeWindow} minutes, they'll be blocked for {blockDuration} minutes.
rateLimitSection.disabledDescription: Rate limiting helps protect your form from spam and abuse by controlling submission frequency.
rateLimitSection.saveFailed: Failed to save rate limiting settings
rateLimitSection.defaultMessage: Too many submissions. Please try again later.

responseLimitSection.title: Response Limit
responseLimitSection.description: Stop accepting submissions after a set total count
responseLimitSection.enableDescription: Limit the total number of submissions this form accepts
responseLimitSection.maxResponsesDescription: Limit the total number of responses this form can accept. Once the limit is reached, new submissions will be blocked.
responseLimitSection.limitReachedDescription: Message shown after the total response limit is reached
responseLimitSection.limitReachedPlaceholder: This form is no longer accepting responses.
responseLimitSection.disabledDescription: Keep this disabled if your form should continue accepting submissions without a cap.
responseLimitSection.defaultMessage: This form is no longer accepting responses.

botProtectionSection.title: Bot Protection
botProtectionSection.description: Automatically detect and block automated submissions
botProtectionSection.enableDescription: Add anti-bot checks for form submissions
botProtectionSection.detectionMessagePlaceholder: Submission blocked due to suspicious bot activity.
botProtectionSection.detectionMessageDescription: Message shown when an automated submission is blocked
botProtectionSection.vercelDescription: If deployed on Vercel, additional anti-abuse checks may apply.
botProtectionSection.disabledDescription: Enable bot protection to reduce spam from automated tools and scripted traffic.
botProtectionSection.saveFailed: Failed to save bot protection settings

quizSection.title: Quiz & Scoring
quizSection.description: Configure quiz behavior and scoring rules
quizSection.enableDescription: Turn on quiz features like scoring and result messages
quizSection.passingScoreDescription: Set the minimum percentage required to pass
quizSection.timeLimitDescription: Optional time limit for quiz completion
quizSection.showScoreDescription: Display the user's score after form submission
quizSection.showCorrectAnswersDescription: Show correct answers and explanations after submission
quizSection.allowRetakeDescription: Let users retake the quiz to improve their score
quizSection.successMessagePlaceholder: Great job! You passed the quiz.

apiSection.title: API Access
apiSection.description: Toggle to allow submissions via the API endpoint
apiSection.enableSupportDescription: Enable external submissions via a secure API key.
apiSection.apiKeySecretHint: Keep this key secret. Anyone with it can submit to this form.
apiSection.integrationRateLimitingDescription: Protect your endpoint from spam bursts.
apiSection.integrationDuplicatePreventionDescriptio: Reduce repeated submissions from the same user.
apiSection.emptyStateDescription: Enable API support to generate a secure API key.
